name: Moodymann
description: '''Kenny Dixon Jr.''', better known by his stage name '''Moodymann''', is an American musician based in [[Detroit]], [[Michigan]]. He released his 1997 debut album ''Silentintroduction'' on the label [[Planet E Communications]]. He is the owner of the record labels Mahogani Music and KDJ Records. He is also a member of the group [[3 Chairs]].
